channel.title: Guido Fawkes
channel.description: Britain's leading news and politics site, blowing up Westminster since 2004, relaunched for 2025

item.title: New ‘Pro-Housing’ Treasury Minister Opposed Development Over ‘Impact on Sunlight and Daylight’
item.dc:creator: Max Young
item.description: Labour’s new ostensibly “pro-development” Treasury minister opposed new housing because it would create a shadow. Gaslit again… Some pro-growth voices have reacted positively to the appointment of Resolution Foundation stooge Dan Tomlinson to Exchequer Secretary to the Treasury – responsible for tax policy. Tomlinson has made YIMBY noises and is liked in pro-housing Labour circles […]

item.title: Government Blocks Details of Secret Social Media Spy Unit
item.dc:creator: Max Young
item.description: DSIT is refusing to say how many staff make up its online censorship squad. The last thing Peter Kyle would reveal… The government is blocking total anonymised salary figures and headcount figure for its National Security and Online Information Team (NSOIT). It says to do so would hinder its ability to ‘monitor and address’ online activity. Can’t […]

item.title: EXC: Quango Officials Spend More Than £20 Million on Flights in Three Years
item.dc:creator: Eleanor Wheatley
item.description: Quangos are treating the taxpayer like their personal airline loyalty program. Over the last three years, civil servants at 73 quangos have spent £20,172,723.78 on 45,792 flights. Not bad for a bunch of pen-pushers whose only remit is in the UK… According to extensive analysis by the TaxPayers’ Alliance, in 2022/23 they spent £5,193,438.71 on […]

item.title: Essex Police Charge Mother After She Unfurled Flag at Epping Protest
item.dc:creator: Eleanor Wheatley
item.description: A woman has been charged after displaying a Union flag at a protest near the Bell Hotel in Epping. What was it Starmer and Cooper were saying about “fly the flag?” On Sunday night, a 40-year-old mother of five was arrested after being removed from a ledge on the first floor of Epping District Council’s […]

item.title: Downing Street Scrambles to Calm Markets as Starmer Fixer Jones Takes on Budget
item.dc:creator: Max Young
item.description: Downing Street is scrambling to calm the markets after they were unconvinced by Starmer’s reset. After stressing to journalists at the Lobby briefing that Reeves was sold on the plans, the official Cabinet meeting readout just now painstakingly stresses the point: “The Prime Minister reiterated the changes made to the No10 operation this week to […]

item.title: “SUSPEND THE VISAS!” Robert Jenrick Reveals His Plan to Fix Britain
item.dc:creator: intern
item.description: As Guido launches our exclusive new video content from our new studio, Robert Jenrick sits down with Adam Cherry and makes news, giving his take on what’s gone wrong with Britain. And how to put it right… He talks the future of the Conservative Party, what he thinks the hotel migrant protests mean for the country, […]

item.title: Rayner Under Fire as 1,200 Finished Homes Left Empty
item.dc:creator: Eleanor Wheatley
item.description: Despite Labour’s much-touted “build, baby, build” promise, Sky News’ Sam Coates reports that 1,210 completed homes remain empty as of August, awaiting clearance from the Building Safety Regulator. Between September 2024 and March this year, only 32% of the regulator’s decisions were made on time… Last year, just 14% of applications cleared ‘gateway 2’ building […]

item.title: MPs Rage After Graham Linehan Reportedly Arrested at Airport Over Tweets
item.dc:creator: Max Young
item.description: Graham Linehan reports he was arrested at Heathrow for tweets he has sent. By five armed police officers… The Father Ted creator and gender critical activist reported on his Substack today that he was removed to a station by van before being questioned. After a nurse measured his blood pressure at over 200 he was […]

item.title: You Spoke and Guido Listened
item.dc:creator: intern
item.description: We heard you. Our old comments system is dead. Guido turns 21 today, and we have launched an open, free-speech-first comments platform. It takes a few seconds to sign up to a free membership enabling you to comment. Just click here… We know there’s no love lost for Vuukle. Its AI moderation system was not right […]

item.title: Zack Polanski Wins Leadership of Green Party
item.dc:creator: Max Young
item.description: Zack Polanski has won the Green Party leadership after a summer of campaigning all following Carla Denyer’s decision to step down. Has implications for an alliance with Corbyn’s crew… 64,581 membership Chowns and Ramsay: 3,705 Polanski: 20,411 A landslide… UPDATE: Rachel Millward elected a Green deputy leader. She is currently living in a house with 6 […]

item.title: Markets Give Verdict on Starmer’s ‘Phase 2’ Reset
item.dc:creator: Max Young
item.description: The markets have issued their verdict: 30-year borrowing costs are at a 27-year high, peaking so far today at 5.702%. Breaching the 5.7% barrier… 10-year borrowing costs at 4.795% are at their highest level since the beginning of April. GBP sold off. Sterling has fallen 1% to 1.34 USD and 0.6% down against the Euro. […]

item.title: REVEALED: Starmer’s New Downing Street Communications Chief Funded Change UK
item.dc:creator: Max Young
item.description: One thing hacks have missed in their estimation of the new Downing Street communications director’s political acumen is his decision to fund Change UK – The Independent Group. Remember them? Allan, who founded and ran the lobbying firm Portland Communications, funded the Brexit heroes led by Chuka Umunna and Anna Soubry in 2019 to the […]
